description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5nr7g","text":"This protocol describes the DNA extraction process at Oregon State University (OSU) using the KingFisher Flex with the Omega Bio-Tek Mag-Bind Blood \u0026 Tissue DNA HDQ 96 Kit. Specific modifications to the original protocol are bolded for easy identification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

{"blocks":[{"key":"8rh8u","text":"This protocol is a modified version of the Omega Bio-Tek Mag-Bind Blood \u0026 Tissue DNA HDQ 96 Kit (https://omegabiotek.com/product/tissue-and-blood-kit-genomic-dna-isolation-mag-bind-hdq-96/?cn-reloaded=1) used for DNA extractions at Oregon State University's Center for Quantitative Life Sciences","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":258,"length":37}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":97,"length":105},{"key":1,"offset":258,"length":37}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9D9E188A60AE11EFAC0E0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://omegabiotek.com/product/tissue-and-blood-kit-genomic-dna-isolation-mag-bind-hdq-96/?cn-reloaded=1"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"DD152AA75F2611EF913E0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://cqls.oregonstate.edu"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"20env","text":"Method description and rationale","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95cj4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1pcd","text":"This modified protocol is used to extract environmental DNA from filtered seawater samples. It has been applied to 0.22μm PVDF and 0.45μm PVDF.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"thl3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3gmgk","text":"Spatial coverage and environment(s) of relevance\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71r5h","text":"This protocol has been used to extract DNA from filtered sea water samples taken from marine coastal stations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ef2at","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8dg1","text":"sea water [ENVO:00002149]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"da22p","text":"http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ENVO_00002149","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":44}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8618F2685F2711EFABCE0A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ENVO_00002149"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5v5qu","text":"Personnel Required","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"du3ch","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqv1n","text":"1 Technician","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5l9t1","text":"Safety\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9n12n","text":"Identify hazards associated with the procedure and specify protective equipment and safety training required to safely execute the procedure","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9kegd","text":"Training requirements\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qeis","text":"Sterile technique, pipetting skills.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49j0b","text":"Time needed to execute the procedure\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dkm4i","text":"Specify how much time is necessary to execute the procedure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2sesr","text":"Before Starting:
• Prepare SPM Buffer, VHB Buffer, and HDQ Binding Buffer according to the ”Preparing
Reagents” section on Page 4 of the Mag-Bind‱ Blood & Tissue DNA HDQ 96 Kit Protocol (https://omegabiotek.com/product/tissue-and-blood-kit-genomic-dna-isolation-mag-bind-hdq-96/?cn-reloaded=1).
• Set heat block, incubator, or water bath to 56°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":341,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":145,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":187,"length":105}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8258F4515F3E11EFA3E90A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8DF709C05F3E11EFA3E90A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://omegabiotek.com/product/tissue-and-blood-kit-genomic-dna-isolation-mag-bind-hdq-96/?cn-reloaded=1"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"52o39","text":"500","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17srr","text":"Prepare a mastermix of AL Buffer and Proteinase K Solution only for samples to be
extracted according to the table below:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91f08","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4dsk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"53qja","text":"* 10% excess volume has been calculated for a 96-well plate.
Important: Only prepare as much AL Buffer/Proteinase K Solution mastermix that will
be used within 4 hours of preparation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":61,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"C_2":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["Component","Amount to Prep","Total Amount per 96-well Plate"],"colWidths":[100,100,100],"data":[["AL Buffer","500 µL","52.8  mL*"],["Proteinase K Solution","40 µL","4.2 mL*"]],"guid":"46F1B8F8E6B642BDBB3381FCD1E46EC2","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["AL Buffer","500 µL","52.8  mL*"],["Proteinase K Solution","40 µL","4.2 mL*"]],"rowHeights":[23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"712av","text":"Extracted DNA concentrations were Quantified with ThermoFisher Quant-iT dsDNA HS assay on a BioTek Synergy H1 Hybrid Multi-Mode plate reader","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ba74f","text":"Identify known issues associated with the procedure, if any.\n\nProvide troubleshooting guidelines when available.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ha6j","text":"Bead beat for 2x45 seconds at 30 Hz on Qiagen Tissue Lyser II","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":61}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2csuo","text":"Transfer filters into homogenization plate (Qiagen collection microtubes with 5mm stainless steel bead in each tube) with 500 uL TL buffer and 40 uL ProK","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":153}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6fdkf","text":" Incubate overnight at 56C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9qu6q","text":"Add 20 uL HDQ mag beads to one KingFisher Deep Well plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":57}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9nq57","text":" Add 320 uL HDQ binding buffer to both KingFisher Deep Well plates","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":66}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2neku","text":"Transfer 200 uL lysate 2x into two KingFisher Deep Well plates filled with 230 uL AL buffer, pipette mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":104}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"814i1","text":"Spin at 4000 x g for 10 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":31}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"38i5v","text":"Add 5 uL RNase A to each sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1u4l3","text":"Repeat steps 25 \u0026 25.1 with the second KingFisher Deep Well plate that did not include the HDQ mag beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":104}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dcutu","text":"Place the plate on a magnetic separation device to magnetize the Mag-Bind‱\nParticles HDQ. Let sit at room temperature until the Mag-Bind‱ Particles HDQ are\ncompletely cleared from solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":136,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"269693C5600311EFB5B70A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"269693C5600311EFB5B70A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"74qd3","text":"Remove the plate from the magnetic separation device.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"art55","text":"Add 600 μL VHB Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"iek5","text":"Note: VHB Buffer must be diluted with 100% ethanol prior to use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"befhp","text":"Aspirate and discard the cleared supernatant. Do not disturb the Mag-Bind‱ Particles\nHDQ.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6C72CAFD600311EFB5B70A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"uur","text":"Aspirate and discard the cleared supernatant. Do not disturb the Mag-Bind‱ Particles\nHDQ.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A47BB8FF600311EFB5B70A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"87bj9","text":"Place the plate on the magnetic separation device to magnetize the Mag-Bind‱\nParticles HDQ. Let sit at room temperature until the Mag-Bind‱ Particles HDQ are\ncompletely cleared from solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":75,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":138,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A02B458D600311EFB47B0A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A02B458D600311EFB47B0A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"90qp9","text":"Vortex for 15 seconds to mix.\nNote: Complete resuspension of the Mag-Bind‱ Particles HDQ is critical for obtaining\ngood purity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":30,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"93C492AD600311EFB5B70A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pome","text":"Add 600 μL SPM Buffer.\nNote: SPM Buffer must be diluted with 100% ethanol prior to use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":23,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c2d8a","text":"Repeat Steps 27-31 for a second VHB Buffer step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3j8ub","text":"Remove the plate from the magnetic separation device.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6fg8g","text":"Vortex for 15 seconds to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"720ma","text":"Add 100 μL Elution Buffer to elute DNA from the Mag-Bind‱\nParticles HDQ.\nNote: Heat Elution Buffer or nuclease-free water to 70°C to improve yield.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":3},{"style":"italic","offset":73,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0083B29460AE11EFBC690A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9c09i","text":"Select one of the following ethanol removal steps:\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"mqvn","text":"Aspirate and discard the cleared supernatant. Do not disturb the Mag-Bind‱ Particles\nHDQ.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"C09C884960AD11EFAC0E0A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8sv20","text":"Place the plate on the magnetic separation device to magnetize the Mag-Bind‱\nParticles HDQ. Let sit at room temperature until the Mag-Bind‱ Particles HDQ are\ncompletely cleared from solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":75,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":138,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"BAD51BEF60AD11EFAC0E0A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"BAD51BEF60AD11EFAC0E0A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"30ban","text":"Remove the plate from the magnetic separation device.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"705gq","text":"A. Leave the plate on the magnetic separation device. Add 500 µL nuclease-free
water (not provided), leave on magnet for 20-30 seconds, and then aspirate.
Do not leave nuclease-free water on Mag-Bind‱ Particles HDQ for more than 60
seconds. Continue to Step 40.
OR","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":262,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":199,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f6rlv","text":"B. Leave the plate on the magnetic separation device. Wait 1 minute. Remove
residual liquid with a pipettor. Dry the Mag-Bind‱ Particles HDQ for an additional
10 minutes. Continue to Step 40.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":125,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"DD583AEF60AD11EFBC690A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"DD583AEF60AD11EFBC690A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"63r58","text":"Transfer the cleared supernatant containing purified DNA to a 96-well microplate (not\nprovided). Store DNA at -20°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5lqfp","text":"Place the plate on the magnetic separation device to magnetize the Mag-Bind‱\nParticles HDQ. Let sit at room temperature until the Mag-Bind‱ Particles HDQ are\ncompletely cleared from solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":75,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":138,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0FF323C960AE11EFBC690A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0FF323C960AE11EFBC690A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2a45","text":"Vortex for 5 minutes to mix.\nNote: If constant vortexing for 5 minutes is not possible, vortex for 15 seconds every\n1-2 minutes for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":29,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
